Uses of Package
com.group11.game

  • Classes in com.group11.game used by com.group11.game
    Class
    Description
    Characters
    Abstract character class representing the moving entities (squirrel and raccoon) in the game.
    CollisionChecker
    CollisionChecker class
    GamePanel
    The GamePanel class represents the main panel for a simple game.
    Items
    Abstract Items Class
    KeyHandler
    KeyHandler class -- interact with Squirrel - Keyboard input from player
    Node
    Node class used for pathfinding algorithm.
    PathFinder
    Pathfinder class represents the A* pathfinding algorithm used to find a path from a start node to a goal node.
    Portal
    The Portal class represents the exit portal in the game.
    Setter
    Setter class for setting items and raccoons onto GamePanel.
    Squirrels
    basic setting class for player(squirrel)
    State
    The State class defines the possible state the code can exist in
    Tile
     
    TileRepresenter
    The TileRepresenter class handles the representation and drawing of tiles on a map.
    UI
    The UI class provides methods for creating and managing the user interface.
